description:
I have a damaged webcam, where the colour always looks purple. This app enables me to remove automatic white-balance and make colour correction when video conferencing.
If it could set the correction permanently I'd give it 5 stars :-)
Qt V4L2 isn't working for me (ubuntu 20.04)
If I can find a way to reduce video lag for my Logitech camera I will give it 5 stars. Having depth of field control would be good too.
summary: Adds camera control but causes video lag
